|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3205DM2I-12G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622FTP-D43; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:24:B2, 00:26:F2, 30:46:9A, A0:21:B7, C0:3F:0E, C4:3D:C7, E0:91:F5 |oui = 00:24:B2, 00:26:F2, 30:46:9A, A0:21:B7, C0:3F:0E, C4:3D:C7, E0:91:F5 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.15;OpenWrt-deriv; |exp_if_types = none |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_inner = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, internal,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, JP2 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = Password |defaultssid = NETGEAR |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR$ |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/25/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00894WP4S |asin_country = |asin2 = B001UI4RTG |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9285;AR9285-AL1A, BF5589C, 0945, KOREA; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976333104" is confirmed to be silkscreened on multiple production model boards. :The same basic hardware is used for the [[Netgear WN604]]. :The same hardware is also used in [[Netgear WNR612v2]]. :all ports (both uplink and downlink) feature automatic MDI/crossover :Known to be running a modified version of OpenWRT 7.09, codenamed "KAMIKAZE" Notable mentions: *[[Netgear WNR1000v2h2]] *[[Netgear WNR1000v2-VC]] ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''PI Electronics (H.K.) Ltd.''' :T012LF1209 16100-2LF (12V, 1A), Netgear P/N: 332-10166-01. :Centre positive 5,5mm/2,1mm barrel. Efficiency Level V, :emits high frequency squeal/high-pitched electronic whine :sound WNR1000v2 itself is silent. UL File Number: E186735. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = PI Electronics |model = T012LF1209 16100-2LF |countrymanuf = China |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |style= }} ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr1000_v2 ''Netgear WNR1000 v2'' on the the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/36-reviews/93-netgear-wnr1000v2.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/wnr1000v2-builds-for-netgear/39360 ''OpenWRT Builds for NETGEAR WNR1000V2/VC'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[https://gist.github.com/SaltwaterC/ef49c8a4df81c8896153 ''Flashing to OpenWRT from Factory Firmware'' on '''gist.github.com'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=263053 ''Netgear WNR1000v2: some success!'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=55144 ''Netgear WN604/WNR612v2/WNR1000v2'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=77302 ''Netgear WNR1000v2 Request'' on '''dd-wrt.com'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=146615 ''Netgear WNR1000v2 Spec.'' on '''dd-wrt.com'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wnr1000_v2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr1000_v2 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/report-devices-here-with-18-06-0-provided-image-too-big-to-save-overlay/18161/72?u=tmomas |forumpage2 = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/wnr1000v2-builds-for-netgear/39360 |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 18.06.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
---> to AR9285 Wifi Controller

         UART       JP2
                     •
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3V]

<--- to AR7140 CPU
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
